QuestData.Title: Falling to Corruption
QuestData.Description: The aggression of the Winterfall furbolg has to have its source somewhere. I'd like to get to the bottom of it if I can!$B$BI've seen the furbolg in the camps to the north brewing something in a cauldron. They seemed very protective of it... if whatever they're cooking up is what's causing this, I must examine it myself.$B$BFind that cauldron if it's still there, and bring me back what's inside!
QuestData.LogDescription: Find the Winterfall Cauldron at the northern Winterfall camp.
QuestData.RewardText: Inside the cauldron bubbles a rotting, repulsive-smelling substance...
